participant_1.background:
My first organic purchase was a locally grown banana for my girlfriend.
My most valuable thing is my memory of seeing Ween live in concert.
i am from russia.
i started at google on an internship.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

participant_2.background:
I love to watch 16 Candles with my family because we can relate to the characters.
I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
I've had to make some tough decisions about my health that were not easy to make.
I keep a journal of my memories to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger.
I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.

content.text: Hi there. What are you up to today?
Hey, not much. Just working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel. What about you?
Same here. I'm working on my organic garden and watching some funny shows on Netflix.
That sounds great! I've always wanted to start an organic garden. Do you have any tips?

Sure. Start by choosing a spot in your yard that gets plenty of sunlight. Then, add some compost to the soil and plant your seeds. Be sure to water your plants regularly and fertilize them every few weeks.
Thanks for the tips! I'll be sure to try them out.
No problem. What kind of shows are you watching on Netflix?
I'm watching a lot of comedies right now. I just finished watching "The Office" and I'm starting "Parks and Recreation."
I love both of those shows! They're so funny.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of "Arrested Development" and "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia."
Those are great shows too! I'm glad we have similar taste in comedy.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who enjoys the same shows as you do.
Yeah, it is. I'm sure we'll get along great.
